name: Mojo de Ajo
author: Bill Echols
summary: 'Mojo de Ajo' means 'garlic gravy' and this 'gravy' is a real treat. Mix with some pasta or brush it on grilled shrimp. The possibilities are endless.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
directions: Place the chipotles in a bowl and cover with very hot water
Allow to soak for 3 minutes; drain
Remove the stems and seeds from the peppers and discard
Cut the peppers into thin strips
Heat the oil in a large skillet over low heat
Cook the garlic in the oil until golden brown, 4 to 5 minutes
Stir in the peppers and the lime juice; simmer 5 minutes; season with the salt
Transfer the mixture to a bowl and allow to cool
Store in the refrigerator in an airtight container
